column1: Cant even pray for good weather, Churches saying stay away
You need a church to pray?
If you don’t pray in church, it’s not answered. 13Edited: 10:00 pm, March 13, 2020
Does that include temples and mosques?
Our archdiocese says stay home and pray, due to coronavirus but send your check tithe in by Monday
